about.title: About
about.description:
We are an actively growing community of software developers. Passion for coding was founded for gathering different people to create a good atmosphere for the education process.

Our community is based in Discord. This platform is a excellent place to build good structure for people communication.

activities.communityDescription: Our discord maintains a warm, friendly atmosphere, so if you suddenly get bored, just write to #coffee-point. And if you want to talk about programming, then #code-channel.
activities.vacanciesDescription: The server regularly posts vacancies in the #vacancies channel, and there are also many people who are happy to respond to them. And if you're looking for like-minded people to participate in a project, post it in #projects.
activities.questionsDescription: We also have a #questions channel, where you can ask questions related to development or a related topic. Read the rules before you ask, and remember that no one will write your code for you.
activities.resourcesDescription:
The #resources and #library channels are for posting posts, repositories, articles, and books that might be useful to a developer. You can also post your own post or article there.

If you want a laugh, we have the #funny channel.
activities.botsDescription: In our #bot-area channel you can interact with a different bots of our community. We have our own bot - passion-bot which has different commands to play with chatGPT and also you can work with bot like MidJourney to draw some beautiful images. Enjoy!

rules.title: Rules
rules.zeroRuleDescription: Be kind and courteous to everyone in the community
rules.firstRuleDescription: Stick to IT topics in all channels. You can talk about general topics in coffee-point
rules.secondRuleDescription: No advertising, not even paid advertising
rules.thirdRuleDescription: The vacancy is only in the vacancies channel and it should be paid. If you are looking for like-minded people for your project, you can tell them about it in projects
rules.fourthRuleDescription: Forbidden topics: racism, sexism, ageism and others that may affect the feelings of others
